critical_failures.details: Multiple currencies detected: GBP (main), EUR (unit price), USD (insurance), JPY (reimbursement)
critical_failures.suggested_fix: Use consistent currency throughout LC, preferably USD for Bangladesh imports

critical_failures.details: GBP as main currency requires special approval for Bangladesh imports over $50,000 equivalent
critical_failures.suggested_fix: Convert to USD or obtain special FX approval from Bangladesh Bank

warnings.details: Four different currencies create exchange rate exposure and settlement complexity
warnings.suggested_fix: Consider currency hedging or standardize to single currency
